description: Try our easy to follow Basic Pancakes With Strawberries & Maple Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Basic Pancakes With Strawberries & Maple Syrup
name: Basic Pancakes With Strawberries & Maple Syrup Recipe | Woolworths
